review: This fire stick was not as user friendly as advertised.  Also, the onscreen instructions are in German.  Also, I don't like having to pay 6 dollars to return something that I didn't have one chance in a hundred of getting to use.
author: Gil

review: Best unit I have tried yet.  It is so intuitive that my 4 year old can navigate with ease.  Thanks for a great product.
author: Amazon Customer

review: It is great. My wifr loves it!!!
author: Al

review: It works really fast! Nice productBut there isn't option for spanish language, this is the reason why I give it 4 stars
author: Alfonso Ros

review: terrible, no HBO Go, Hulu Plus sporadically worked and then the whole thing stopped working
author: Cam Bauchner

review: CONS:1. I have been using Chromecast for 2 years now.2. Not sure why I decided to go Firestick route.3. Poor bluetooth connection4. Poor WIFI - Slow - Very poor.5. Powering is problem - Connecting to Firestick USB to the TV is not enough AC juice. This device MUST BE PLUGGED IN AC outlet--- Bloody stone age... So if you have already mounted TV on the wall then better get ready to take it down to run this wire to AC plug.6. NO YOUTUBE embedded..... What??????????? Trying to download youtube app is takes for aware.PROS:Interface is good.
author: Jay
